original_text:
I went about mourning
    as though for my friend or brother.
I bowed my head in grief
    as though weeping for my mother.
korean_text: 내가 나의 친구와 형제에게 행함 같이 그들에게 행하였으며 내가 몸을 굽히고 슬퍼하기를 어머니를 곡함 같이 하였도다

sentences.original_text: as though for my friend or brother
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 내 친구나 형제를 위해 애도하는 것처럼

sentences.original_text: I bowed my head in grief
as though weeping for my mother
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 내 어머니를 위해 우는 것처럼
